column4: durring login i get the error: User's $Home/.dmrc file is being ignored. This prevents the defalt session and language from being saved. File should be owned by userand have 644 premissions. Users home directory must be owned by users and not writable by other users.
how do i go about fixing this
and/or where do i find the 1st file the change the premissions
chown changes the user/group of a file, and chmod the rights
